Posted By: mkniffen (9/27/2009 12:40:07 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This would actually be sick in my Angel deck. I wouldn't really care about the flying tidbit since practically all Angels have flying, but indestructibility is always a good thing. Couple that with token generators like [Luminarch Ascension](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Luminarch Ascension) and [Sigil of the Empty Throne](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sigil of the Empty Throne), and you're pretty much set.

Posted By: SocialExperiment (9/28/2009 10:33:29 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
In the Pre-release I had to wait for an alpha strike opportunity before being willing to play it with the drawback of sacrificing creatures...even at that, if it hit the table it was game over. In that environment the +1/+1 and Flying are generally enough and the Indestructability is bonus.
  
   
In constructed the Indestrucatiblity is the key and the others are bonus. Either way it can be game over quickly.
posts.html:

In constructed the Indestrucatiblity is the key and the others are bonus. Either way it can be game over quickly.
